item.title: People in space right now - R shiny app
item.description: The idea The inception of fancy R shiny apps in my mind came from the mysterious web algorithm of google I guess. I have to start something. Now, where to start? Suddenly this idea of an R Shiny app which shows the details of International Space Station popup. Ok, that sounds good. But where to start? The implementation The benefit of the shiny app is the sharing options it provides. Thankfully, the data obtained from api.
